com.bizosys.hsearch.index
Class DocMeta

java.lang.Object
  com.bizosys.hsearch.index.DocMeta
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStorable, IDimension
Direct Known Subclasses:
DocMetaWeight
public class DocMeta
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStorable, IDimension

It Stores meta information about the document. These meta section helps on dynamic filteration as well as ranking during searching mechanism. An empty meta is currently only 6 byte length.

Author:
karan

geoHouse

The Geo House.

weight

public int weight
Document weight : Integer which biases the ranking algorithm. Document weight is lifted based on it's depth, source A home page will have more weight than the deeper location. documents from Intel page will have more weight This could be manually increased to influence the ranking mechanism

docType

public java.lang.String docType
Document Type Table Name / File Extension / Dna Name

ipHouse

public int ipHouse
From which IP address is this document created. This is specially for machine proximity ranking.

securityHigh

public boolean securityHigh
High Security setting. During high security, the information kept encrypted.

By default the sentiment is positive.

toBytes

public byte[] toBytes()
Returns all the necessary fields for processing. orgUnit is treated specially. It goes in a column This helps to search just on orgUnit fields and then retrieve documents. It stores type.. If the type is * means matches all

Specified by:
toBytes in interface IStorable
